body:
You have swap, that is all I wanted to see (most hosting providers disable it, which throws the Linux kernel for a fit, overcommit wise)



> On 17 Dec 2014, at 11:16, bictorman <notifications@github.com> wrote:
> 
> There you go.
> 
> https://storage.googleapis.com/golang/go1.4.linux-amd64.tar.gz
> 
> $ free -m
>              total       used       free     shared    buffers     cached
> Mem:          1974       1932         41          0        290        770
> -/+ buffers/cache:        871       1102
> Swap:         4094          0       4094
> Is late in Europe, I'll provide any extra required information in the morning. I can grant access to one of the servers if needed.
> 
> â€”
> Reply to this email directly or view it on GitHub.
>
